properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 7:37PM CST until February 22 at 6:25PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331 Highway Bridge Affecting Montgomery
County.

.Recent rainfall is producing rises along Catoma Creek at the
U.S. 331 Highway Bridge. Additional rainfall expected over the
next 24 hours is forecast to bring levels above flood stage.
Therefore...a flood warning is now in effect.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331 Highway Bridge.
* from Thursday evening to Saturday evening...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 7 PM Wednesday The stage Was 14.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 20 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by tomorrow evening and continue
to rise to near 21.1 feet by Friday evening. The river will fall
below flood stage by Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 20 feet...Flooding of agricultural lands in the
vicinity of the U.S. 331 Highway Bridge occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
